panels.description: Number of actively mirrored partitions for which the broker is leader
panels.title: Mirror Partition Count

panels.description: Number of mirrored partitions that are under replicated.
panels.title: Mirrored Topic under replicated.

panels.description: Number of mirrored partitions that are under min ISR.
panels.title: Mirrored Topic under min isr.

panels.description: Number of mirrored partitions that are blocked on fetching data due to issues on the source cluster.
panels.title: Mirrored Partitions Blocked

panels.description: Maximum lag in messages between the replicas on the destination cluster and the leader replica on the source cluster. Provides an indication of overall cluster link health and a relative measure of whether the destination cluster is lagging behind.
panels.title: Max Lag

panels.description: Number of dead threads of type ClusterLinkThread, where a dead thread is indicative of an issue with fetching from the source cluster for a partition.
panels.title: Dead Thread Count

panels.description: Number of failed mirror partitions for which the broker is leader. A partition may be in a failed state if the source partition’s epoch has gone backwards; for example, if the topic was recreated.
panels.title: Failed Partitions Count

panels.description: Depending on the request name, provides statistics on requests on the cluster link, including requests and response times, time requests wait in the queue, size of requests (bytes), and so forth.
panels.title: Total Time Ms

panels.description: Depending on the request name, provides statistics on requests on the cluster link, including requests and response times, time requests wait in the queue, size of requests (bytes), and so forth.
panels.title: Local Time Ms

panels.title: Request Queue Time Ms

panels.description: Depending on the request name, provides statistics on requests on the cluster link, including requests and response times, time requests wait in the queue, size of requests (bytes), and so forth.
panels.title: Response Queue Time Ms

panels.description: Depending on the request name, provides statistics on requests on the cluster link, including requests and response times, time requests wait in the queue, size of requests (bytes), and so forth.
panels.title: Remote Time Ms

panels.description: Depending on the request name, provides statistics on requests on the cluster link, including requests and response times, time requests wait in the queue, size of requests (bytes), and so forth.
panels.title: Response Send Time Ms

panels.description: Depending on the request name, provides statistics on requests on the cluster link, including requests and response times, time requests wait in the queue, size of requests (bytes), and so forth.
panels.title: Throttle Time Ms

panels.description: Depending on the request name, provides statistics on requests on the cluster link, including requests and response times, time requests wait in the queue, size of requests (bytes), and so forth.
panels.title: Response Send IO Time Ms
